EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmed case of H1N1
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Today I was informed that there has been a confirmed case of H1N1 in Year 3. Due to production rehearsals this child has been in both campuses and mixed closely with Y3&4 children. Please look out for any of the following symptoms and do not send your child in if they exhibit any of these symptoms.
Fever above 37.5 degrees Vomiting Sneezing, cough and runny nose Severe headaches and aching body Diarrhea or stomach upset
School will continue to make sure every child uses sanitiser gel and as happens daily in primary that their temperature is taken in the morning. Cleaners are in Sunday disinfecting the campus. Sodexo and SHF have been informed to ensure they do the same in the kitchens. Both nurses are aware of the situation and on alert.
Below is further information http://www.nhs.uk/Conditions/Pandemic-flu/Pages/Symptoms.aspx
Kind regards, Janet Brock Headteacher
British International School Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
